csongor bartus

web designer & developer with product skills

Csongor Bartus

Csongor met computers in 1990 before the PC era. It was a HT-1080Z school computer programmable via machine code and BASIC.

Since then he was playing all roles on all sides of the table. And left with the desire to enchant people with beautiful interactive interfaces and digital storytelling.

You can find out more about him at:

  • Twitter, where he taps the spirit of the day
  • Tumblr, where he foresees the future
  • The Metamn, where he writes short essays occasionally

About Csongor

Csongor is one of the few unicorns available today.

From consulting to deployment he helps you to deliver your message across all devices and browsers.

Working with him you'll get more. A product instead of a simple website.
